net.sourceforge.aglets.itinerary.helpers
Class BaseCircularTaskItinerary

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.aglets.itinerary.helpers.BaseItinerary
      net.sourceforge.aglets.itinerary.helpers.BaseTaskItinerary
          net.sourceforge.aglets.itinerary.helpers.BaseCircularTaskItinerary
All Implemented Interfaces:
MobilityListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, CircularItinerary, Itinerary, SimpleItinerary, TaskItinerary
public class BaseCircularTaskItinerary
extends BaseTaskItinerary
implements CircularItinerary

This class represents a task itinerary that loops over destination, thus the agent has always a next destination.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Luca Ferrari - cat4hire@users.sourceforge.net 1/10/2005
See Also:

Method Detail

goToNextDestination

public void goToNextDestination()
Forces the migration to the next destination. If the migration is not possible, the stacktrace and the exception are printed, but the agent is not required to handle the exception.

Specified by:
goToNextDestination in interface Itinerary
Overrides:
goToNextDestination in class BaseItinerary

getLoopCount

public int getLoopCount()
Provides information about the loops performed by the agent owner of this itinerary.

Specified by:
getLoopCount in interface CircularItinerary
Returns:
the number of loop (0 if the agent has not yet completed the first trip).
